article_title: 2015 Tax Rates, Brackets & Exemption Amounts May Save Taxpayers Money

article_metadata.description: The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics reported today that the consumer price index (CPI) has dropped off by .2%. That dip means that inflation should stay put: what does that mean for 2015 tax rates?
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb
